title: Living jazz
creator_credit: Jack Gold, John Hall, Paddy Whannel and British Film Institute
brief_description: A candid study of the Bruce Turner Jump Band at work, at individual and group practice rehearsal, on tour and as they discuss and arrange their music. Music written and arranged by Bruce Turner. Instruments: Bruce Turner (Alto Sax), John Mumford (Trombone), Johnny Chilton (Trumpet), Colin Bates (Piano), Jim Bray (Bass), Johnny Armitage (Drums). Presented by Doug Dobell and Ken Lindsay.
